title: Members of the British Sri Lankan Forum (BSLF)-UK visit British Prime Minister
content: Onlanka News – Pix by: Janaka Alahapperuma, Lal Dias and Ishan Bazeer Members of the British Sri Lankan Forum (BSLF)-UK visited No: 10, Dawning Street, the official residence of British Prime Minister David Cameron recently. They were allowed to go through the famous door, giving a very unusual time slot to hand over a petition…
